00040 Parameterization ParameterizationFMD = {
00041   name : "FMD",
00042   Pararead : FMDread,
00043   Parawrite : FMDwrite,
00044   Paraclone : FMDclone,

00051 // number of real parameter of a Gaussian
00052 #define NGAUSS 12

00054 
00055 void FMDclone(const Para* q, Para* qp)
00056 {
00057   int i;
00058 
00059   strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
00060   qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
00061   qp->n = q->n;
00062 
00063   qp->x = malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00064   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00065     qp->x[i] = q->x[i];
00066 
00067   qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00068   qp->internals = malloc(sizeof(FMDInternals));
00069   FMDInternals *qpint = qp->internals;
00070   FMDInternals *qint = q->internals;
00071 
00072   qpint->ng = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00073   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00074     qpint->ng[i] = qint->ng[i];
00075   qpint->idx = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00076   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00077     qpint->idx[i] = qint->idx[i];
00078   qpint->xi = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00079   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00080     qpint->xi[i] = qint->xi[i];
00081 
00082 }

00085 #define BUFSIZE 255
00086 
00087 int FMDread(FILE* fp, Para* q)
00088 {
00089   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00090   int i;
00091   FMDInternals* qint;
00092 
00093   qint = q->internals = (FMDInternals*) malloc(sizeof(FMDInternals));
00094                                         
00095 
00096   do
00097     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00098   while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
00099   if (feof(fp)) {
00100     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
00101     return -1;
00102   }
00103   
00104   char Pname[80], qname[80];
00105 
00106   sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
00107   if (strcmp(Pname, "FMD")) {
00108     fprintf(stderr, "not a FMD parameter set\n");
00109     return -1;
00110   }
00111   strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));
00112 
00113   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00114   if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d", &q->A, &q->Z, &q->N) != 3) {
00115     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00116     exit(-1);
00117   }
00118   if (q->A != q->Z+q->N) {
00119     fprintf(stderr, "proton and neutron number don't sum up in line\n>>%s<<\n",
00120             stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00121     return -1;
00122   }
00123   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00124   if (sscanf(buf, "%d", &q->ngauss) != 1) {
00125     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00126     return -1;
00127   }
00128 
00129   qint->idx = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00130   qint->ng = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00131   qint->xi = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00132   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++) {
00133     qint->idx[i] = 0;
00134     qint->ng[i] = 0;
00135     qint->xi[i] = 0;
00136   }
00137   
00138   q->n = q->ngauss*NGAUSS;
00139 
00140   q->x = malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00141 
00142   int k, xi;
00143   double chi0re, chi0im, chi1re, chi1im;
00144   double are, aim, b0re, b0im, b1re, b1im, b2re, b2im; 
00145   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00146     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00147     if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d "
00148                "(%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf)", 
00149                &k, &xi, &chi0re, &chi0im, &chi1re, &chi1im, 
00150                &are, &aim, &b0re, &b0im, &b1re, &b1im, &b2re, &b2im) != 14) {
00151       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00152               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00153       return -1;
00154     }
00155     qint->ng[k]++;
00156     qint->xi[k] = xi;
00157     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = chi0re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = chi0im;
00158     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = chi1re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = chi1im;
00159     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = are;    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = aim;
00160     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6] = b0re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7] = b0im;
00161     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8] = b1re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9] = b1im;
00162     q->x[i*NGAUSS+10] = b2re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+11] = b2im;
00163   }     
00164   for (k=1; k<q->A; k++) 
00165     qint->idx[k] = qint->idx[k-1]+qint->ng[k-1];
00166 
00167   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00168   if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
00169     fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
00170     return -1;
00171   }
00172 
00173   return 0;
00174 }

00177 int FMDwrite(FILE* fp, const Para* q)
00178 {
00179   int k, ki, i;
00180   FMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00181 
00182   fprintf(fp, "<Para FMD %s>\n", q->name);
00183   fprintf(fp, "%d %d %d\n", q->A, q->Z, q->N);
00184   fprintf(fp, "%d\n", q->ngauss);
00185   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00186     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++) {
00187       i = qint->idx[k]+ki;
00188       fprintf(fp,
00189               "%2d  %+2d  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
00190               k, qint->xi[k],
00191               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1],
00192               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3],
00193               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5],
00194               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7],
00195               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9],
00196               q->x[i*NGAUSS+10], q->x[i*NGAUSS+11]);
00197   }
00198   fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");
00199 
00200   return 0;
00201 }

00204 void FMDinitSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00205 {
00206   int k, ki;
00207   FMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00208 
00209   Q->A = q->A; Q->Z = q->Z; Q->N = q->N;
00210   Q->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00211 
00212   Q->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00213   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00214     Q->idx[k] = qint->idx[k];
00215 
00216   Q->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00217   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00218     Q->ng[k] = qint->ng[k];
00219 
00220   Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
00221   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++) 
00222     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
00223       Q->G[qint->idx[k]+ki].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
00224 }

00226 
00227 void FMDtoSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00228 {
00229   int i;
00230 
00231   // this is a one-to-one mapping
00232 
00233   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00234     Q->G[i].chi[0] = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1];
00235     Q->G[i].chi[1] = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3];
00236     Q->G[i].a      = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5];
00237     Q->G[i].b[0]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7];
00238     Q->G[i].b[1]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9];
00239     Q->G[i].b[2]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+10] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+11];
00240   }
00241 }

00243 
00244 void FMDprojectgradSlaterDet(const Para* q,
00245                              const gradSlaterDet* dQ, double* dq)
00246 {
00247   int i;
00248 
00249   // only converting a complex in a real gradient
00250 
00251   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00252     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].chi[0]);
00253     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].chi[0]);
00254     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].chi[1]);
00255     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].chi[1]);
00256     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].a);
00257     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].a);
00258     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[0]);
00259     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[0]);
00260     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[1]);
00261     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[1]);
00262     dq[i*NGAUSS+10] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[2]);
00263     dq[i*NGAUSS+11] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[2]);
00264   }
00265 }

00268 void SlaterDetinitFMD(const SlaterDet* Q, Para* q)
00269 {
00270   int i;
00271   FMDInternals* qint;
00272 
00273   strcpy(q->name, nucleusname(Q->A, Q->Z));
00274 
00275   q->A = Q->A;
00276   q->Z = Q->Z;
00277   q->N = Q->N;
00278 
00279   qint = q->internals = malloc(sizeof(FMDInternals));
00280                                         
00281   qint->idx = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00282   qint->ng = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00283   qint->xi = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00284   for (i=0; i<Q->A; i++) {
00285     qint->idx[i] = Q->idx[i];
00286     qint->ng[i] = Q->ng[i];
00287     qint->xi[i] = Q->G[Q->idx[i]].xi;
00288   }
00289 
00290   q->ngauss = Q->ngauss;
00291   q->n = Q->ngauss*NGAUSS;
00292   q->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00293 
00294   for (i=0; i<Q->ngauss; i++) {
00295     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = creal(Q->G[i].chi[0]);
00296     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = cimag(Q->G[i].chi[0]);
00297     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = creal(Q->G[i].chi[1]);
00298     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = cimag(Q->G[i].chi[1]);
00299     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = creal(Q->G[i].a);
00300     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = cimag(Q->G[i].a);
00301     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6] = creal(Q->G[i].b[0]);
00302     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7] = cimag(Q->G[i].b[0]);
00303     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8] = creal(Q->G[i].b[1]);
00304     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9] = cimag(Q->G[i].b[1]);
00305     q->x[i*NGAUSS+10] = creal(Q->G[i].b[2]);
00306     q->x[i*NGAUSS+11] = cimag(Q->G[i].b[2]);
00307   }
00308 }
